body:
The `memkind` package builds `jemalloc`. It should declare a conflict with the `jemalloc` package to ensure that not both are installed simultaneously (or rather, that not both can be used simultaneously since the respective symbols in the generated libraries conflict).

Alternatively, `memkind` could just depend on `jemalloc` if that is possible.
title: `memkind` builds `jemalloc`
